/git-sync.description: Pull, merge, and push changes in one command
/git-sync.command: git pull && git add . && git status && echo 'Ready to commit and push? Press Enter to continue or Ctrl+C to cancel' && read && git commit -m 'sync: automated sync via Claude Code' && git push

/git-quick.description: Quick commit and push current changes
/git-quick.command: git add . && git commit -m 'update: quick changes via Claude Code' && git push

/git-feature.command: git checkout -b feature/$1 && echo 'Created and switched to feature/$1 branch'

/git-commit.command: git add . && git commit -m '$1: $2' && git push

/git-pr.description: Create pull request for current branch
/git-pr.command: gh pr create --title '$1' --body 'Created via Claude Code' --head $(git branch --show-current) --base main
